oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Confederate soldier John Lafayette Lemonds
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 1st Lt. John L. Lemonds of Co. C, 5th Inf. CSA, a unit recruited largely from Henry County, is writing to his future wife Miss M. [Ellen] McCorkle. He asks for the return of his letters and promises to return hers. He has heard rumors--untrue as it turned out--that she was married or planned to do so. He says: "I wish the affection of no one who does not regard me above all others."
